content:
Privacy Policy for Countora

Effective Date: 19 November 2024

Countora ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use our mobile application ("the App").

1. Information We Collect

We do not collect any personally identifiable information (PII) from you. The only data we may collect pertains to application errors to improve the functionality and reliability of the App.

a. Error Data

In the event of an application error or crash, we may collect non-personal, anonymized information such as:

  • Device type and operating system version.
  • Error logs and crash reports.
  • App version being used.

This information is collected solely for diagnosing and resolving technical issues.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
app.countora@gmail.com

By using the App, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please refrain from using the App.
